Content: The handing over of letters of appointment as Development Officers under the Government’s programme of granting 16,800 graduates took place in several areas. Letters of appointment were handed over to 689 Development Officers at the auditorium of the Kalutara District Secretariat. The event was held under the patronage of Minister Rajitha Senaratne. A group including Parliamentarian Lakshman Wijemanne was present. The handing over of appointment letters to trainees in the Nuwara Eliya District took place with the participation of Non–Cabinet Minister V. Radhakrishnan. 218 graduates received appointments on this occasion. The handing over of letters of appointment to graduates of the Ampara District took place under the patronage of Deputy Minister Anoma Gamage. 631 graduates received their appointments at the event that took place at the Hardy Higher Educational Institute. A group including Parliamentarians M.I.M. Mansoor and S.M. Mohammed Ismail joined in the occasion.
